fields.name: DeviceLastScannedDateTime
fields.description: The last time when a scan was done on the device.

fields.name: DeviceVersionNumber
fields.description: The current version of the device in format: 1.2.17312.13.",

fields.name: FriendlyDeviceVersionName
fields.description: The current version of the device in text format.

fields.name: InProgressDownloadJobId
fields.description: The job ID of the download job in progress.

fields.name: InProgressDownloadJobStartedDateTime
fields.description: The time when the currently running download (if any) started.

fields.name: InProgressInstallJobId
fields.description: The job ID of the install job in progress.

fields.name: InProgressInstallJobStartedDateTime
fields.description: The time when the currently running install (if any) started.

fields.name: LastCompletedDownloadJobDateTime
fields.description: The time when the last Download job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance.

fields.name: LastCompletedDownloadJobId
fields.description: JobId of the last ran download job.(Can be success/cancelled/failed)

fields.name: LastCompletedInstallJobDateTime
fields.description: The time when the last Install job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance.

fields.name: LastCompletedInstallJobId
fields.description: JobId of the last ran install job.(Can be success/cancelled/failed)

fields.name: LastCompletedScanJobDateTime
fields.description: The time when the last scan job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance.

fields.name: LastDownloadJobStatus
fields.description: JobStatus of the last ran download job.

fields.name: LastInstallJobStatus
fields.description: JobStatus of the last ran install job.

fields.name: LastSuccessfulInstallJobDateTime
fields.description: The time when the Last Install job was completed successfully on the appliance

fields.name: LastSuccessfulScanJobTime
fields.description: Time when the last scan job is successfully completed.

fields.name: OngoingUpdateOperation
fields.description: The current update operation.

fields.name: RebootBehavior
fields.description: Indicates if updates are available and at least one of the updates needs a reboot.

fields.name: TotalNumberOfUpdatesAvailable
fields.description: The number of updates available for the current device version as per the last device scan.

fields.name: TotalNumberOfUpdatesPendingDownload
fields.description: The total number of items pending download.

fields.name: TotalNumberOfUpdatesPendingInstall
fields.description: The total number of items pending install.

fields.name: TotalTimeInMinutes
fields.description: The total time in Minutes

fields.name: TotalUpdateSizeInBytes
fields.description: The total size of updates available for download in bytes.

fields.name: UpdateTitles
fields.description: The list of updates available for install.

fields.name: Updates
fields.description: The list of updates available for install.
